caption:
“I die daily.” — 1 Corinthians 15:31

Reflection:
Each sunrise invites another small surrender. The soul grows by laying down self again and again. Death to pride becomes life to peace.

Commentary:
Paul’s words speak of renewal through letting go — dying to ego, envy, and control so the Spirit may live through us.
